title: hymperion
author: hymperion
content: https://cryptoexperticonminers.netthe prices of some items seem normal to me, others a little too cheap according to my tastes ...Does anyone know him??

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Their reviews would suggest they're a scam: https://www.trustpilot.com/review/golddiamondminer.com Their web address isn't great either - "icon miners" sounds like something that doesn't make sense and they could happily change. How did you find the site? Was it an ad or a search result or did someone/somewhere recommend them?

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: hymperion on December 21, 2022, 05:44:36 PMothers a little too cheap according to my tastes ...Probably a scam website, I took a look, and nothing seems too cheap to begin with, could you point out what are the cheap deals listed on these websites and what type of miners are you interested in? I will give you the actual market prices in China and Hong Kong.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Be careful I tried to check their few pages it seems that their website is not finished yet there are some pages that do not have content and after checking the source code of the website they are using CMS WordPress. And most of the product they sell looks like used units that do not exist. They are also selling Innosilicon units which don't have any support anymore.So there is a high chance that this website is scam.If you are looking for cheap units why not buy directly from Canaan they have pretty cheap units with the same hash rate.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: hymperion on December 21, 2022, 05:44:36 PMhttps://cryptoexperticonminers.netthe prices of some items seem normal to me, others a little too cheap according to my tastes ...Does anyone know him??Why go for an unknown site, yet there are a number of popular official online stores. Just checked the site and almost all the brands have officlal online stores or verified resellers.My friend, prevention is better than cure. Don't so something you will regret later just because it was a few bucks cheaper.

comments.author: stompix
comments.created_time: December 22, 2022, 01:37:22 AMLast edit: May 20, 2023, 07:19:47 PM by stompix
comments.body: Fake image of their business? Checked!Fake reviews? Checked!Common, the image is called..young-family-with-their-little-son-at-home-scaled-100x100.jpgÂ  Same description for miners that matches cryptoasicethminer, cryptominnerbross, cryptoasicsminers, interesting pattern at least.So, the trifecta of stay away from it.

comments.author: hymperion
comments.body: I found the site while wandering the internet and I was intrigued.https://cryptoexperticonminers.net/product/bitmain-antminer-l7-9-16-gh-for-sale/https://cryptoexperticonminers.net/product/fusionsilicon-x7-262gh-x11-miner/https://cryptoexperticonminers.net/product/bitmain-antminer-d7-1286gh-for-sale/https://cryptoexperticonminers.net/product/canaan-avalon-1066-50th-s-miner-for-sale/these are the ones that intrigued me.currently I don't want to buy other asic, it weighs me to anticipate again for the next bull, but if there is some good deal I can't miss.I don't buy the caanan units because of the type of single c19 socket which with 15A would force me to make changes to my electrical system.

comments.author: kano
comments.body: Why keep listing links to a site that is clearly a scam?

comments.author: hymperion
